channel.title: Esstoren PvP - 11k Accounts made - G.E. Home - Casket Eco System
channel.description:
If your a PK'er on RSW, you have most properly played this server of mine.
I don't recommend using it if you plan to be a big server, but it works.
Massive thanks to everyone who played this, was an absolute awesome experience! The 2 months on the top spot unchallenged where what made us what we are, I am making an Eco which will destroy the competition, updates on that very soon.
[quote="luna-scape"]Post da features[/quote]
Torva and all the nex stuff, korasi spec, G.E. home (fatality copy basicly). Near enough Combat, 99.9% dupes fixed, around 90% of bugs/glitches fixed. Dragon Claws spec, donation benefits that make people pay ALOT to have them, casket eco which is an idea from battlescape put into pvp. 525 interfaces, maps and items with some 618 or whatever it is. Torva and statius and phats and cracker and all that jazz. Void elite effects.
^^ Off the top of my head.
Basicly I took what I liked from servers and made my own little bundle of joy. To bad its Vistex. Re-making on a blank PI and should be better.
Download Link : http://uppit.com/rimnna0n07e2/Esstoren_Server.zip
Media : Login Message - G.E. Home [img]http://puu.sh/1T3E2[/img]
Multi Pking (::multi) - Bank is Safe. [img]http://puu.sh/1T3Il[/img]
Single Pking - Outside of the G.E. [img]http://puu.sh/1T3M8[/img]
Casket Eco System - Players drop caskets, open them for cash. [img]http://puu.sh/1T3R8[/img]
